targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_feedback FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%feedback%' OR content ILIKE '%suggestion%' OR content ILIKE '%improve%' OR content ILIKE '%better%' OR content ILIKE '%issue%' OR content ILIKE '%problem%' OR content ILIKE '%bug%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%feedback%' OR text ILIKE '%suggestion%' OR text ILIKE '%improve%' OR text ILIKE '%better%' OR text ILIKE '%issue%' OR text ILIKE '%problem%' OR text ILIKE '%bug%')) feedback_messages;

SELECT COUNT(*) as positive_sentiment FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%great%' OR content ILIKE '%awesome%' OR content ILIKE '%excellent%' OR content ILIKE '%amazing%' OR content ILIKE '%love%' OR content ILIKE '%perfect%' OR content ILIKE '%thank%' OR content ILIKE '%good%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%great%' OR text ILIKE '%awesome%' OR text ILIKE '%excellent%' OR text ILIKE '%amazing%' OR text ILIKE '%love%' OR text ILIKE '%perfect%' OR text ILIKE '%thank%' OR text ILIKE '%good%')) positive_messages;

SELECT COUNT(*) as negative_sentiment FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%bad%' OR content ILIKE '%terrible%' OR content ILIKE '%hate%' OR content ILIKE '%worst%' OR content ILIKE '%awful%' OR content ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR content ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR content ILIKE '%broken%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%bad%' OR text ILIKE '%terrible%' OR text ILIKE '%hate%' OR text ILIKE '%worst%' OR text ILIKE '%awful%' OR text ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR text ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR text ILIKE '%broken%')) negative_messages;

WITH sentiment_data AS (SELECT COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE content ILIKE '%great%' OR content ILIKE '%awesome%' OR content ILIKE '%excellent%' OR content ILIKE '%amazing%' OR content ILIKE '%love%' OR content ILIKE '%perfect%' OR content ILIKE '%thank%' OR content ILIKE '%good%') as positive, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE content ILIKE '%bad%' OR content ILIKE '%terrible%' OR content ILIKE '%hate%' OR content ILIKE '%worst%' OR content ILIKE '%awful%' OR content ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR content ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR content ILIKE '%broken%') as negative FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo()) all_messages) SELECT CASE WHEN (positive + negative) > 0 THEN ROUND((positive * 100.0) / (positive + negative), 1) ELSE 50 END as sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data;

WITH daily_sentiment AS (SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) as time, 'Positive' as sentiment_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%great%' OR content ILIKE '%awesome%' OR content ILIKE '%excellent%' OR content ILIKE '%amazing%' OR content ILIKE '%love%' OR content ILIKE '%perfect%' OR content ILIKE '%thank%' OR content ILIKE '%good%') GROUP BY date_trunc('day', created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) as time, 'Negative' as sentiment_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%bad%' OR content ILIKE '%terrible%' OR content ILIKE '%hate%' OR content ILIKE '%worst%' OR content ILIKE '%awful%' OR content ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR content ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR content ILIKE '%broken%') GROUP BY date_trunc('day', created_at) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', date) as time, 'Positive' as sentiment_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%great%' OR text ILIKE '%awesome%' OR text ILIKE '%excellent%' OR text ILIKE '%amazing%' OR text ILIKE '%love%' OR text ILIKE '%perfect%' OR text ILIKE '%thank%' OR text ILIKE '%good%') GROUP BY date_trunc('day', date) UNION ALL SELECT date_trunc('day', date) as time, 'Negative' as sentiment_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%bad%' OR text ILIKE '%terrible%' OR text ILIKE '%hate%' OR text ILIKE '%worst%' OR text ILIKE '%awful%' OR text ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR text ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR text ILIKE '%broken%') GROUP BY date_trunc('day', date)) SELECT time, sentiment_type as metric, SUM(count) as value FROM daily_sentiment GROUP BY time, sentiment_type ORDER BY time;

WITH feedback_categories AS (SELECT 'Feature Request' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%feature%' OR content ILIKE '%add%' OR content ILIKE '%request%' OR content ILIKE '%suggestion%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%feature%' OR text ILIKE '%add%' OR text ILIKE '%request%' OR text ILIKE '%suggestion%')) feature_requests UNION ALL SELECT 'Bug Report' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%bug%' OR content ILIKE '%broken%' OR content ILIKE '%error%' OR content ILIKE '%issue%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%bug%' OR text ILIKE '%broken%' OR text ILIKE '%error%' OR text ILIKE '%issue%')) bug_reports UNION ALL SELECT 'General Feedback' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%feedback%' OR content ILIKE '%opinion%' OR content ILIKE '%think%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%feedback%' OR text ILIKE '%opinion%' OR text ILIKE '%think%')) general_feedback UNION ALL SELECT 'Improvement' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM (SELECT content FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%improve%' OR content ILIKE '%better%' OR content ILIKE '%enhance%') UNION ALL SELECT text as content FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%improve%' OR text ILIKE '%better%' OR text ILIKE '%enhance%')) improvements) SELECT category, count FROM feedback_categories WHERE count > 0 ORDER BY count DESC;

WITH recent_feedback AS (SELECT 'Discord' as platform, COALESCE(author_display_name, author_username) as author, content as message, created_at as time, CASE WHEN content ILIKE '%great%' OR content ILIKE '%awesome%' OR content ILIKE '%excellent%' OR content ILIKE '%amazing%' OR content ILIKE '%love%' OR content ILIKE '%perfect%' OR content ILIKE '%thank%' OR content ILIKE '%good%' THEN 'Positive' WHEN content ILIKE '%bad%' OR content ILIKE '%terrible%' OR content ILIKE '%hate%' OR content ILIKE '%worst%' OR content ILIKE '%awful%' OR content ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR content ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR content ILIKE '%broken%' THEN 'Negative' ELSE 'Neutral' END as sentiment FROM discord_messages WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom() AND created_at <= $__timeTo() AND author_is_bot = false AND (content ILIKE '%feedback%' OR content ILIKE '%suggestion%' OR content ILIKE '%improve%' OR content ILIKE '%better%' OR content ILIKE '%issue%' OR content ILIKE '%problem%' OR content ILIKE '%bug%' OR content ILIKE '%feature%' OR content ILIKE '%request%') UNION ALL SELECT 'Telegram' as platform, COALESCE(NULLIF(TRIM(from_user_first_name || ' ' || COALESCE(from_user_last_name, '')), ''), from_user_first_name, from_user_username, 'Unknown') as author, text as message, date as time, CASE WHEN text ILIKE '%great%' OR text ILIKE '%awesome%' OR text ILIKE '%excellent%' OR text ILIKE '%amazing%' OR text ILIKE '%love%' OR text ILIKE '%perfect%' OR text ILIKE '%thank%' OR text ILIKE '%good%' THEN 'Positive' WHEN text ILIKE '%bad%' OR text ILIKE '%terrible%' OR text ILIKE '%hate%' OR text ILIKE '%worst%' OR text ILIKE '%awful%' OR text ILIKE '%frustrat%' OR text ILIKE '%disappoint%' OR text ILIKE '%broken%' THEN 'Negative' ELSE 'Neutral' END as sentiment FROM telegram_messages WHERE date >= $__timeFrom() AND date <= $__timeTo() AND (text ILIKE '%feedback%' OR text ILIKE '%suggestion%' OR text ILIKE '%improve%' OR text ILIKE '%better%' OR text ILIKE '%issue%' OR text ILIKE '%problem%' OR text ILIKE '%bug%' OR text ILIKE '%feature%' OR text ILIKE '%request%')) SELECT platform AS "Platform", author AS "Author", CASE WHEN LENGTH(message) > 100 THEN SUBSTRING(message, 1, 100) || '...' ELSE message END AS "Message", time AS "Time", sentiment AS "Sentiment" FROM recent_feedback ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 20;
